name: PirateBoi
description:
A 2D platformer where you play as a pirate boy  in ship to loot treasures. 

Interactions are simple as jumping, walking, moving and climbing objects to navigate your player around the map. There will be challenges and puzzles throughout the game, and there are just five levels.

Player Controls:

W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys for movement of the player

Space repeatedly on objects and walls to climb

Space bar to jump

Credits:

Game made in Unity by Clinton Thai

Art Assets:

TBA
